summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 47th Street, from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 6th Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same; property owners' 100% limit petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 198815, to all in accordance with the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
